name: Shard of the Fractured Oath
core: A break in alignment suggests the original purpose has been split from its present expression.
shadow: Fracture becomes distortion when the broken piece is mistaken for the whole.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates the split can be repaired only by naming it plainly.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests not forcing a false unity before the break is understood.

name: Shard of Echoing Reflection
core: A reflected pattern suggests the present issue is repeating in a smaller and more revealing form.
shadow: Reflection becomes confusion when echoes are treated as independent truths.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward using the smaller pattern as a guide to the larger one.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests waiting until the echo settles into a clearer shape.

name: Shard of the Sundered Crown
core: A claim to authority suggests the symbol remains active even after the true center has broken apart.
shadow: Authority becomes distortion when the emblem is obeyed after its legitimacy has failed.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward testing whether the sign still carries real authority.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests treating inherited power with greater suspicion.

name: Shard of the Hollow Vow
core: An empty promise suggests form remains where substance has quietly withdrawn.
shadow: Form becomes deception when the vow is maintained only to preserve appearance.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates the promise can still be repaired if truth is restored to it.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests assuming less and verifying more.

name: Shard of Borrowed Light
core: A secondhand brilliance suggests the matter is being guided by reflected conviction rather than a native center.
shadow: Borrowed light becomes false certainty when imitation is mistaken for revelation.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward using the reflection carefully without surrendering judgment to it.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests tracing the light back to its true source before trusting it.

name: Shard of the Forked Path
core: A divided route suggests the original movement has split into alternatives that no longer agree on their destination.
shadow: Choice becomes confusion when each branch claims the whole pattern for itself.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward mapping the divergence before choosing which line to strengthen.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests refusing to commit until the points of separation are understood.

name: Shard of the Veiled Name
core: A hidden designation suggests the truth of the matter is being approached through aliases, substitutions, or silence.
shadow: Concealment becomes distortion when the missing name alters the meaning of everything around it.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates the veil can be lifted with careful and exact language.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests noting what cannot yet be named instead of forcing a false title.

name: Shard of the Reversed Sigil
core: A sign turned inward suggests the pattern is still potent, but now acts against its stated purpose.
shadow: Reversal becomes sabotage when the sign is trusted after its direction has plainly changed.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward correcting the symbol before its force spreads further.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests tracing the inversion back to the point where it began.

name: Shard of the Split Mirror
core: A fractured reflection suggests the matter is presenting multiple true-looking faces that do not reconcile cleanly.
shadow: Multiplicity becomes distortion when every fragment is treated as a complete account.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward comparing the pieces until the inconsistency becomes visible.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests resisting any urge to choose the most flattering reflection too quickly.

name: Shard of the Drifting Axis
core: A moved center suggests the question is being organized around a principle that no longer sits where it once did.
shadow: Displacement becomes distortion when the old center is still treated as fixed after it has already shifted.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward identifying the new center before further action is taken.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests slowing down until the reorganization can be measured accurately.

name: Shard of the False Horizon
core: An apparent destination suggests the field is offering a stopping point that may not actually resolve the journey.
shadow: Hope becomes distortion when the first horizon is mistaken for the final one.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward testing the destination before building around it.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests conserving effort until the horizon proves real.

name: Shard of Ashen Memory
core: A burned remembrance suggests the pattern is carrying loss that has already altered the shape of recollection.
shadow: Memory becomes distortion when absence is allowed to overwrite what truly occurred.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward recovering what can still be named from the ruin.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests treating memory as wounded rather than neutral.

name: Shard of the Gilded Mask
core: A polished surface suggests the field is being made more acceptable than it truly is.
shadow: Presentation becomes distortion when beauty is used to interrupt scrutiny.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward separating what is appealing from what is true.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests distrusting any answer that arrives already perfected.

name: Shard of the Unfastened Gate
core: A boundary left unsecured suggests the pattern is admitting influences it was not meant to carry.
shadow: Openness becomes distortion when every threshold is treated as harmless.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward identifying what entered and whether it belongs.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests securing the gate before evaluating the new traffic.

name: Shard of the Waning Chorus
core: A fading consensus suggests agreement is weakening faster than the appearance of harmony admits.
shadow: Consensus becomes distortion when silence is mistaken for assent.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward restoring clarity by asking who has already fallen quiet.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests assuming less unity than the surface implies.

name: Shard of Redacted Truth
core: An altered record suggests the matter has been shaped by omission, deletion, or managed forgetting.
shadow: Editing becomes distortion when the missing part determines the meaning of what remains.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward recovering what was removed before drawing conclusions.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests distrusting any account that arrives too cleanly arranged.

name: Shard of the Thin Boundary
core: A weakened separation suggests two patterns are beginning to overlap in ways neither fully contains.
shadow: Contact becomes distortion when crossed boundaries are treated as natural after the fact.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward tracing the line before the overlap widens.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests reducing movement across the boundary until its integrity is known.

name: Shard of the Broken Standard
core: A damaged banner suggests the shared symbol still gathers force even after its claim has been compromised.
shadow: Loyalty becomes distortion when the standard is followed after the cause has fractured.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward reexamining the symbol before rallying under it again.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests letting the standard fall if it no longer names the truth.

name: Shard of Counterfeit Mercy
core: A false gentleness suggests the field may be softening its language while preserving its harm.
shadow: Mercy becomes distortion when leniency is offered only to delay real accountability.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward testing whether the grace offered changes the structure or only the tone.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests refusing comfort that leaves the wound untouched.

name: Shard of the Divided Flame
core: A split fire suggests the same force is now feeding opposing meanings at once.
shadow: Passion becomes distortion when every side claims the whole blaze for itself.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward identifying which fire still serves the true work.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests reducing fuel until the divided flames separate cleanly.

name: Shard of the Tilted Scale
core: An uneven measure suggests the judgment shaping the matter is already leaning, even if it still claims neutrality.
shadow: Fairness becomes distortion when the scale is treated as just after the weights have been tampered with.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward remeasuring the claim before acting on the verdict.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests assuming hidden pressure until the balance is proven.

name: Shard of the Last Echo
core: A final repetition suggests the pattern is fading, but not before one last and possibly misleading recurrence.
shadow: Repetition becomes distortion when the last echo is treated as the living source.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward using the echo as evidence, not as origin.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests waiting for the silence after the echo before deciding what remains true.
